name: Red Forest Rampage (Early prototype. Specially for the AI Game Jam)
name_original: Red Forest Rampage (Early prototype. Specially for the AI Game Jam)
description:
Red Forest Rampage (Early prototype. Specially for the AI Game Jam)

Controls:

SPACE - Jump
SPACE (HOLD) - Long Jump
LMB - Shoot

PREPARE FOR THE DEATHRUN

As the zombie apocalypse ravaged the war-torn streets of the city, a lone soldier of the special forces rode through the chaos on his trusty bike. With his mission to reach the Nuclear Station and eliminate the terrorists who had unleashed the deadly radiation, he knew that the path ahead would not be easy.

Dodging hordes of undead creatures, the soldier made his way through the debris-strewn city, using his expert combat skills and quick reflexes to fend off the zombie attacks. As he rode through the abandoned streets, he saw firsthand the devastation wrought by the terrorist attack that had led to the outbreak.

Submitted to AI game jam: https://itch.io/jam/ai-game-jam-1

If you are interested in insights about the upcoming updates of this game and our new projects, follow us on Telegram

The game is actually just a prototype! It was made in less than two days for an AI Game Jam.

All the assets, in-game texts, images, and music were generated by the AI.

Resources and assets used:

1. In-game text (and text for this page): ChatGPT
2. In-game images: Midjourney, DALL-E2, RemovalAI
3. Music: AivaAI
4. Code assistance: ChatGPT, Intellisence
5. Sounds and SFX: JDWasabi's Pack of Sound Effects
